meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear
감사 I would like to thank you.
감사 I would like to express my thanks.
감사 I want to express my appreciation.
만남 I missed you so much.
만남 I really wanted to see you.
만남 I was hoping to see you again.
실용회화-오랜만에 만났을 때 I missed you.

vlive.english: I wanted to do this! I wanted to do this!
I thought you watch TV series because of it. - Right?

vlive.korean: 여기 내 와이프 오은경 분명 있지만 나 진짜 너랑 하고 싶었어!
vlive.english: Even if my wife Oh Eunkyung is here. I wanted to sleep with you.

examples.korean: 스무 명의 손님이면 충분하지 않을까 싶었어요.
examples.english: Twenty guests are enough, I would have thought.

examples.korean: 꽉 끼는 치마의 지퍼를 정말로 내리고 싶었어.
examples.english: I really wanted to unzipple the tight skirt.

examples.korean: 의대 졸업한 우리 큰형을 그냥 축하하고 싶었어.
examples.english: Just wanted to congratulate my big brother on graduating from medical school.

examples.korean: 나는 단지 내가 한 행동에 대해서 정말 미안하고, 나의 행동에 모든 책임을 질 거라고 말하고 싶었어.
examples.english: I just wanted to tell you I’m really sorry for what I did and I’ll take full responsibility for my actions.
